header.title: Castor Transformer
header.abstract: This document describes the castor transformer of Cocoon.

s1.title: Castor Transformer
s1.p: With this transformer, a Bean that is stored in the session,Sitemap, Session, Request or the Conext is marehalled to XML and inserted in the SAX stream at a given position.
Configuation: The Castortransformer need to be configured with a default mapping. This mapping is used as long as no other mapping is spezfied as the element

The CastorTransfomer support only one Element castor:InsertBean. This element is replaced with the marshalled object. The Object given through the attrbute name will be searched in the sitemap, request, session and at least in application If the scope is explicitly given, e.g , the object will ge located only here The Attribut mapping specifys the mapping to be used. If not given the default mapping is used

p.source: <zoo xmlns:castor="http://castor.exolab.org/cocoontransfomer"> <castor:InsertBean name="Mouse"/> <castor:InsertBean name="Hamster" mapping="castor/mapping_de.xml"/> <castor:InsertBean name="Elefant" scope="session"/> <castor:InsertBean name="Elefant" scope="request"/> </zoo>

s1.p: Documentaion about the castor mapping is provided at the Castor Website Castor XML Mapping .
